physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe subglottic stenosis of trachea, 1.5 cm below vocal cords, lumen diameter 4 mm
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood pressure declined during procedure; pulse rate maintained stable

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Acute exacerbation of chronic respiratory failure, initial tachycardia and hypertension.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood pressure and heart rate stabilized post-sedation; respiratory rate decreased.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Presence of artificial upper trachea (Montgomery stent), chronic pain requiring opioid therapy, difficulties with airway management due to scar tissue.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No detailed changes over time specified.
